time.description: The date and time of the event (on the server). Defaults to NOW()

userID.description: The Zooniverse User ID of the user performing the event

type.description: The event type e.g. login, leave, classify, view, etc

subjectID.description: If the event applies to a subject, e.g. classify, then this is the Zooniverse ID of the subject

relatedID.description: If applicable, this may contain a related ID such as collection ID, classification ID, etc

projectToken.description: The project identifier as used at https://api.zooniverse.org/projects/list , e.g. 'serengeti' )

experiment.description: If an experiment was running at the time, this is the name of the experiment, e.g. 'SerengetiHappinessExperiment1'

cohort.description: If an experiment was running at the time, this is the name of the cohort this user was assigned to, e.g. 'control'
